other_tests.findings: Vague 4.5-cm hypodense area within the caudate lobe, no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation, gallbladder unremarkable, fatty atrophy of the pancreas, kidneys unremarkable without stones or hydronephrosis, mild atherosclerosis in abdominal aorta. A left fat-containing inguinal hernia was noted.
